Package tage.networking.server

Class UDPClientInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • tage.networking.server.UDPClientInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IClientInfo
    public class UDPClientInfo
extends java.lang.Object
implements IClientInfo
    Implementation of IClientInfo used for UDP protocol. Stores the client's address, port they are listening on, and the current server socket.
    Author:
    Kyle Matz Modified from the SAGE Networking package for the RAGE game engine by Juan E. Ruiz. Ported to TAGE by Scott Gordon.

    • Constructor Summary

      UDPClientInfo​(java.net.InetAddress address, int port, UDPServerSocket serverSocket)

      • sendPacket

        public void sendPacket​(java.io.Serializable object)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Sends the Serializable object to the client whose information this data structure is storing. Uses the current server socket to send the object.
